# outputURL

**Instance Property**

A URL for a file to write the capture data into.

## Declaration

```swift
var outputURL: URL? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `nil`. If you set [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCaptureDescriptor/destination] to [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCaptureDestination/gpuTraceDocument], you need to set this property to where you want the file to be written to.

## Setting capture parameters

- **captureObject**: The instance whose contents should be captured.
- **destination**: The destination for any captured command data.
